title: [1.8.8] [256x] Dark Souls 黑暗之魂
author: 夜頥瑿
txt_content:
本帖最后由 夜頥瑿 于 2017-1-7 16:45 编辑 



Dark Souls Legacy黑暗之魂——————————————————————这是一款由《黑暗之魂3》作画风的1.8材质包这款材质包更改了原版minecraft 90%的纹理材质，且更新工作目前仍然进行中，许多方块具有不同的随机纹理，画风偏向中世纪黑暗，适用于1.8版本


■作者原文■

The extremely detailed Texture Pack and use Connected Textures. All textures takes from the game by a dumping and adapted to Minecraft. I change about 90% of all block textures (work still in process), a lot of objects. Many blocks has a different textures for different sides (sides, top, bottom) and consist of 4-16 pieces.With this texture pack you can build your own Lordran. At least: Undead Asylum, Firelink Shrine, Undead Burg, Undead Parish, Sen's Fortress, Anor Londo, Demon Ruins. Demonstration video of the map imitating part of a location of the Undead Burg created especially for of texture pack:Old video of a beta of textures pack. It is useful for that it is possible to see textures of Anor Londo:


■图片欣赏■






■历史更新■-{1.0.7} 14/10/2015-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- <FIXED>
All items! - realy sorry about this. In 1.0.6 I make a mistake and transparency still present in 256x vervison. I fix it now (hope). <ADDED>

gold_sword - now it is a Moonlight Greatsword *You may contact with me: darksoulsrespack@gmail.comYour opinion is important for me.

■下载地址■请优先选择原贴下载

原贴下载：https://mods.curse.com/texture-packs/minecraft/230844-dark-souls-legacy#t1:changes备用百度云：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1cy2QZG
为保证视觉效果请安装Optifine高清修复
